title: 2023-02-09 å¦‚ä½•ç†è§£è‡ªæ³¨æ„åŠ›æœºåˆ¶

contents:
æ•°æ®å‡è¡¡

åšæ–‡æœ¬åˆ†ç±»æ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœç±»åˆ«æ•°é‡å·®åˆ«ä¸å¤§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨hugging faceçš„Trainerç±»ï¼Œè®­ç»ƒä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š


model = BertForSequenceClassification.from_pretrained("bert-base-chinese", num_labels=len(labels),
                                                      problem_type="multi_label_classification", id2label=id2label,
                                                      label2id=label2id)

tokenizer = BertTokenizerFast.from_pretrained("bert-base-chinese")

def compute_metrics(p):
    preds = p.predictions[0] if isinstance(p.predictions,
                                           tuple) else p.predictions
    result = multi_label_metrics(
        predictions=preds,
        labels=p.label_ids)
    return result

training_args = TrainingArguments(
    output_dir=model_directory, 
    learning_rate=5e-5,
    per_device_train_batch_size=2,
    per_device_eval_batch_size=2,
    num_train_epochs=3,
    dataloader_drop_last=True,
    weight_decay=0.01,
    save_steps=50,
    logging_steps=50
)

trainer = Trainer(
    model=model,
    args=training_args,
    train_dataset=data["train"],
    eval_dataset=data["train"],
    tokenizer=tokenizer,
    compute_metrics=compute_metrics
)

trainer.train()
trainer.evaluate()

model_directory æ˜¯æ¨¡å‹å­˜å‚¨è·¯å¾„ï¼Œdataæ˜¯æ•°æ®ã€‚
